title: IEEE Magnetic Society webinar
text:
I will give a IEEE Magnetic Society webinar entitled “Pushing creativity further in electrical machine design using topology optimization”.
Do not hesitate to check it out at the following link, on November 6, 1pm.

title: Théodore Cherrière
text:
Welcome,
I’m Théodore Cherrière, a Postdoctoral researcher at RICAM.
I hold a Ph.D. in electrical engineering from the University Paris-Saclay (ENS Paris-Saclay), where I worked at the SATIE.
My main research interest consists of topology optimization of electrical machines.

title: Keynote talk at CISTEM 2024
text: I am honoured to give a keynote talk at IEEE CISTEM 2024 conference, entitled “Topology optimization of rotating electrical machines: state of the art and applications”.
